Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
28.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended TIPS_INVOICENO to alpha 20 for input/screen
03.03.2011 GB SCR15757 Replaced the logic to retrieve the radio button labels
via LinkQuery on table COCO by program GB306
01.03.2011 SH SCR16238 Added new admin currency logic (removed GNRL_CURRENCY)
13.09.2010 SH SCR15801 Added test "Not allowed to change the administration
number of the draft" (Message ID = PH0314)
22.10.2008 SH SCR14060 Added FCI handling regarding to test "Client not allowed
for this curency"
04.08.2008 SH SCR13853 Removed whole intercredit tests
19.05.2007 AK SCR13631 Extend the check on intercredit client (legal debtors)
07.02.2007 SH SCR12289 Added GSET_YESNO = 'Y' (GSET_ID=124) to enable testings
if client is allowed for BTCP_CURRENCYCLNT
19.05.2006 SH SCR10673 Changed test "Client not allowed for curency"
18.04.2006 SH SCR10936 Added BPH111.PI.DISCOUNTCREDITNOTES = N
1. Extended test "Client not allowed for curency" with " or CLNT108_ACC_CURR <>
BTCP_CURRENCYCLNT
12.01.2006 SH SCR10003 Added new test "Client not allowed for curency" if
BTCH_BTCHCODE = cheques and client curency <> client currency of previous
entered / selected client
07.09.2005 SH SCR9004 Added new test "Client not allowed for this currency"
19.05.2005 SH SCR8315 Changed test on CLNT316_PAYMENTSONSPECADM = 'Y'
from ERROR to INFO
07.04.2005 SH SCR8081 Added new test on client, it's not allowed to use clients
where CLNT316_PAYMENTSONSPECADM = 'Y'
02.09.2004 SH SCR6943 Added new argument to call for OPH202B6
PI.PROGRAM_ID = 'OPH202B'
16.04.2004 SH SCR3627 Extended argument list for BPH112, see SCR for details
08.09.2003 SH SCR4296 Added 4. radiobutton choice "no amounts", see SCR for
- details
04.08.2003 SH SCR3778 Added test if CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 2--> not allowed
17.04.2003 SH SCR3356 Init radiobutton with previous value if a new invoice
- number will be entered
15.04.2003 SH SCR3288 Fixed bug with "+" key if GB007 was called
24.03.2003 RR -> SCR3195 Implementation of shortcut handling
05.11.2002 SCR2469 SH Give error if user wanted to select an intercredit client
09.10.2002 SH Changed list of arguments for BPH113 according to new SPECS and
- add new field TIPS_DEBC_NO
02.09.2002 SH Diff. BUG-FXES, switched last argument for BPH113 from 'Y' to 'N'
20.08.2002 SH Use the DATE() instead of BTCH_DATE as argument for GB002

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1 where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_INVO_NO = :3 FOR READ ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
